description: Learn Bootstrap to quickly build responsive websites with pre-designed components.

lessons.title: Introduction to Bootstrap
lessons.content: Understand what Bootstrap is and how to include it in your projects.

lessons.title: Grid System
lessons.content: Master Bootstrap's grid system for responsive layouts.

lessons.title: Components
lessons.content: Use Bootstrap's pre-designed components like buttons, cards, and navbars.

lessons.title: Utilities
lessons.content: Apply Bootstrap utility classes for quick styling.

lessons.title: Customization
lessons.content: Customize Bootstrap to match your design requirements.

lessons.title: Responsive Design
lessons.content: Create fully responsive websites with Bootstrap.

lessons.title: Mini Project: Responsive Portfolio
lessons.content: Build a complete responsive portfolio using Bootstrap.

lessons.title: Advanced Grid System
lessons.content: Deep dive into Bootstrap's advanced grid features including flexbox utilities and responsive breakpoints.

lessons.title: Custom Components and Extensions
lessons.content: Create custom components and extend Bootstrap's functionality with additional plugins.

lessons.title: Theming and Sass Integration
lessons.content: Learn how to theme Bootstrap using Sass variables and mixins for custom designs.

lessons.title: Bootstrap 5 New Features
lessons.content: Explore new features and improvements in Bootstrap 5 including CSS Grid, RTL support, and updated components.

lessons.title: Performance Optimization
lessons.content: Optimize Bootstrap performance by customizing builds and using only required components.

lessons.title: Accessibility Features
lessons.content: Implement accessibility best practices with Bootstrap's built-in accessibility features.

lessons.title: Mini Project: E-commerce Dashboard
lessons.content: Build a complete e-commerce dashboard using advanced Bootstrap components and layouts.
